pages.text:
VETTEFEST at Old Town - Saturday, October 4, 2025
Car Shows
&
Events
upcoming Signature events
Excitement is always on the schedule at Old Town! From weekly car shows to live music that fills the air with timeless hits, every visit is a celebration. Whether youâre soaking in the nostalgia or joining us for one of our signature events, thereâs always something unforgettable happening.
Car shows
Every week at Old Town, we celebrate the automobile's rich history with special events that bring together car lovers of all stripes, making it a prime destination for Florida car shows. For nearly 35 years, Old Town has been a dreamy escape for car lovers from diverse cultures around the globe.
Wednesday Night Bike Show
Starting September 10th, mid-week brings its charm with this bike show that brings in everything from modern touring motorcycles to timeless classics. Each Wednesday from 6-10 P.M., the bike show transforms Old Town Entertainment District, featuring all makes and models of touring motorcycles, Harley, Indian, trikes and slingshots! Under the glow of string lights lining our quaint brick streets, guests are treated to Central Florida's most biker-friendly free event with live music, restaurants, shopping, attractions, and bars!
Friday Night Muscle Car Show & Cruise
Feel the pulse of excitement every Friday night at our Muscle Car Show! Starting at 3:00pm, guests can walk along Trophy Row to see a world of
show-quality muscle cars from 1964 and newer
âand
older hot rods and classics dating up to 1985
(No Patina Allowed).
Both car owners and spectators can enjoy the thrill of the show and cruise at no cost.
Cars can register on-site prior to the cruise by entering Old Town from Highway 192 beneath the east side of the Jukebox signs. Our Event Staff will welcome you and guide you to a security escort that will lead you down the historic brick streets to your spot. Remember, driving on the bricks is by permission only.
Start time: 3:00 PM
Registration: 3:00 - 7:30 PM
Cruise Kick-off: 8:30 PM
â
Cruisers, don't miss out on
$2,000 in monthly giveaways
â$1,000 on Fridays and another $1,000 on Saturdays. Each cruise you join at Old Town on Fridays or Saturdays enters you into a monthly draw. On the last Friday and Saturday of the month, one lucky Cruiser will win $1,000 per night, courtesy of Old Town!
Saturday Night Classic Car Show & Cruise
For nearly 35 years, our Classic Car Cruise has showcased vehicles manufactured prior to 1985, like hot rods, classics and antiques(No Patina Allowed)! Locals and visitors alike come from all over the world to watch our Classic Car Show & Cruise, which can have up to 250 cruisers! This event has been a staple, providing a weekly dose of nostalgia and excitement you wonât want to miss!Â
Cruisers! Register your car on-site by arriving via Highway 192, where you'll spot the iconic Jukebox signs on the east entrance. Our friendly Event Staff will greet you and coordinate a security escort to guide you along the historic brick streets to your designated spot, in preparation for the cruise. Please remember, only registered cars are permitted to drive on the bricks.
Start time: 1:00 PM
Registration: 1:00 - 7:30 PM
Cruise Kick-off: 8:30 PM
Don't forget, cruising at Old Town can be extra rewarding with our
$2,000 monthly giveaways
â$1,000 given away each Friday and Saturday. Join us for any cruise on these nights and you'll automatically be entered into our monthly drawing. As the month wraps up, one fortunate Cruiser will be chosen each night on the final Friday and Saturday to win $1,000!
events schedule
Our event schedule is always full at Old Town, with daily events designed to entertain all ages! Here, every occasion becomes a celebration; whether you're experiencing the thrills of our weekly car shows, enjoying live music that fills the night air with familiar melodies spanning eras and genres, or attending one of our signature events, Old Town ensures that your visit is packed with memories.
Our weekly events included:
Tuesday - Karaoke
Wednesday - Themed Car Show
Thursday - Karaoke
Friday - Muscle Car Show and Cruise
Saturday - Classic Car Show and Cruise
Last Sunday of each Month - Import Car Show
In addition to our weekly events, families can look forward to our signature events:
Halloween at Old Town - October 31st
VetteFest - First Saturday in October
New Yearâs Eve - December 31st
4th of July - July 4th
Classic Car Show & Cruise Anniversary - Third Saturday in March

VETTEFEST at Old Town - Saturday, October 4, 2025
Get in Touch
Hours &Â locations
5770 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee FL, 34746
(407) 396-4888
Hours:Â Monday - Sunday 11:00 am - 11:00 pm
Security/Lost and Found:
(407) 225-0553
Interested in leasing space at Old Town?
Read more about our
Leasing Opportunities
.
Directions
Old Town is located one mile east of I-4 (exit 67) at 5770 W. Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway (Hwy. 192) in Kissimmee, FL.
leasing opportunities
We have available retail / storefront space as low as 675 Sq feet to space measuring 1,500 sq. feet. There is retail kiosk units on Main Street and throughout the property also available.If you are interested in retail space or a kiosk at Old Town, please contact the following:
